directions: Blend chickpeas, water, lemon juice, sesame seed oil, olive oil, garlic, salt, cumin, and black pepper together in a blender or food processor until smooth, adding more water if hummus is too thick.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans) - drained, rinsed, and mashed
2 tablespoons water, or more as needed
title: Sesame Seed Oil Hummus
